headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com; img-src 'self' data:; connect-src 'self' https://la-pince-production.up.railway.app; object-src 'none'; base-uri 'self'; frame-ancestors 'none'; upgrade-insecure-requests;
